org.opengrok.suggest

Class Suggester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.suggest.Suggester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class Suggester
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Provides an interface for accessing suggester functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Suggester.NamedIndexDir
      Model classes for holding project name and path to its index directory.
      static class  Suggester.NamedIndexReader
      Model class to hold the project name and its IndexReader.
      static class  Suggester.Suggestions
      Result suggestions data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Suggester

        public Suggester(File suggesterDir,
                 int resultSize,
                 Duration awaitTerminationTime,
                 boolean allowMostPopular,
                 boolean projectsEnabled,
                 Set<String> allowedFields,
                 int timeThreshold,
                 int rebuildParallelismLevel)
        Parameters:
        suggesterDir - directory under which the suggester data should be created
        resultSize - maximum number of items that should be returned
        awaitTerminationTime - how much time to wait for suggester to initialize
        allowMostPopular - specifies if the most popular completion is enabled
        projectsEnabled - specifies if the OpenGrok projects are enabled
        allowedFields - fields for which should the suggester be enabled, if null then enabled for all fields
        timeThreshold - time in milliseconds after which the suggestions requests should time out

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Collection<Suggester.NamedIndexDir> luceneIndexes)
        Initializes suggester data for specified indexes. The data is initialized asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        luceneIndexes - paths to Lucene indexes and name with which the index should be associated

      • rebuild

        public void rebuild(Collection<Suggester.NamedIndexDir> indexDirs)
        Rebuilds the data structures for specified indexes.
        Parameters:
        indexDirs - paths to lucene indexes and name with which the index should be associated

      • remove

        public void remove(Iterable<String> names)
        Removes the data associated with the provided names.
        Parameters:
        names - names of the indexes to delete

      • search

        public Suggester.Suggestions search(List<Suggester.NamedIndexReader> indexReaders,
                                    SuggesterQuery suggesterQuery,
                                    org.apache.lucene.search.Query query)
        Retrieves suggestions based on the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        indexReaders - index readers with specified name (OpenGrok's project name)
        suggesterQuery - query for suggestions
        query - query on which the suggestions depend
        Returns:
        suggestions

      • onSearch

        public void onSearch(Iterable<String> projects,
                     org.apache.lucene.search.Query query)
        Handler for search events.
        Parameters:
        projects - projects that the query was used to search in
        query - query that was used to perform the search

      • setResultSize

        public void setResultSize(int resultSize)
        Sets the new maximum number of elements the suggester should suggest.
        Parameters:
        resultSize - new number of suggestions to return

      • setAwaitTerminationTime

        public void setAwaitTerminationTime(Duration awaitTerminationTime)
        Sets the new duration for which to await the initialization of the suggester data. Does not affect already running initialization.
        Parameters:
        awaitTerminationTime - maximum duration for which to wait for initialization

      • increaseSearchCount

        public void increaseSearchCount(String project,
                                org.apache.lucene.index.Term term,
                                int value)
        Increases search counts for specific term.
        Parameters:
        project - project where the term resides
        term - term for which to increase search count
        value - positive value by which to increase the search count

      • getSearchCounts

        public List<Map.Entry<org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef,Integer>> getSearchCounts(String project,
                                                                                String field,
                                                                                int page,
                                                                                int pageSize)
        Returns the searched terms sorted according to their popularity.
        Parameters:
        project - project for which to return the data
        field - field for which to return the data
        page - which page of data to retrieve
        pageSize - number of results to return
        Returns:
        list of terms with their popularity

        public void close()
        Closes opened resources.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable

        close in interface AutoCloseable
